abstract: Richard C. Breeden has raised his stake in the Zale Corporation, the jeweler, to 13.3 percent from 7.7 percent.
snippet: Richard C. Breeden has raised his stake in the Zale Corporation, the jeweler, to 13.3 percent from 7.7 percent.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON (Reuters)  Richard C. Breeden, the former Securities and Exchange Commission chairman who is now an activist investor, has raised his stake in the Zale Corporation, the jeweler, to 13.3 percent from 7.7 percent, according to a regulatory filing made Wednesday.
